__[Get Action|http://open-forum.onestonesoup.org/OpenForum/Documentation/Reference/UsingWikiActions]__  Copies a page then deletes the original.
----
!!Parameters
*pageName
*newPageName

----
!!Server Side Javascript for GET method
{{{ if(typeof(pageName)=="undefined")
{
	transaction.setResult(transaction.SHOW_PAGE);
}
else
{
	newPageName = 	transaction.getParameter("newPageName");
	wiki.copyPage(pageName,newPageName,null);
	wiki.deletePage(pageName);
	transaction.goToPage(newPageName); 

}
 }}}
